watson_developer_cloud/watson_tone_analy.Description: Takes a peice of text and runs it through Watson's tone analyzer, returning possible emotions of the text with associated confidence values.
watson_developer_cloud/watson_tone_analy.Output: A dictionary of emotions and confidence values
watson_developer_cloud/watson_tone_analy.Input: Any list of signals with text attributes

Data Field.description: An expression that should evaluate to text
